titles.title: Open The Eyes Of My Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Open the eyes of my heart, Lord,
Open the eyes of my heart.
I want to see you,
I want to see you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To see you high and lifted up,
Shining in the light of Your glory.
Pour out Your power and love
As we sing holy, holy, holy,
Holy, holy, holy,
Holy, holy, holy,
Holy, holy, holy.
I want to see you.
